Sinopse: Hot on the trail of Eastern-European criminal kingpin Zogu, old-school FBI Agent Reed unexpectedly finds himself at a well-organized elementary school. Knowing that Zogu is after a tiny flash drive containing highly sensitive information, Reed must pose as a substitute kindergarten teacher to stand a chance of retrieving the precious item that is hidden somewhere in the classroom of a mysteriously-deceased instructor. Reed needs to take control of the class without blowing his cover; but things get tricky. Can tough officer Reed gain the classroom's confidence before it's too late?—Nick Riganas
